bradleyross.common

Class communicationsWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • bradleyross.common.communicationsWindow

  • public class communicationsWindow
extends Object
    This class opens a window for communications with a port on another system.
    Author:
    Bradley Ross

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private TextArea bottomWindow
      The bottomWindow TextArea is used to hold information being prepared for transmission.
      private Button closeButton
      The closeButton Button can be used to close the connection when it fails to close normally.

        The number of columns in the TextArea objects currently.

      • widthCurrent

        protected int widthCurrent
        The width of the TextArea objects in pixels when they are colsCurrent columns wide.

      • widthLarger

        protected int widthLarger
        The width of the TextArea objects in pixels when they are colsLarger columns wide.

      • rowsSmaller

        protected int rowsSmaller
        Used to determine the number of rows that should be in the TextArea objects when the height of TextArea objects is made slightly smaller.

        The TextArea.getMinimumSize method is applied to an object eight rows taller than the topWindow object. This allows room for bottomWindow and the buttons.

      • rowsCurrent

        protected int rowsCurrent

      • rowsLarger

        protected int rowsLarger

      • heightSmaller

        protected int heightSmaller
        This is the height in pixels returned by the TextArea.getMinimumSize method for a TextArea block rowsSmaller rows in height.

      • heightCurrent

        protected int heightCurrent
        This is the height in pixels returned by the TextArea.getMinimumSize method for a TextArea block rowsCurrent rows in height.

      • heightLarger

        protected int heightLarger
        This is the height in pixels returned by the TextArea.getMinimumSize method for a TextArea block rowsLarger rows in height.

      • initialized

        protected boolean initialized
        Set to true when the objects in the window have been initialized.

        Some events related to window movement and resizing may be generated before the objects fully initialized. These should not be responded to as the sizes and locations have not yet been set.

      • bottomWindow

        private TextArea bottomWindow
        The bottomWindow TextArea is used to hold information being prepared for transmission.

      • topWindow

        private TextArea topWindow
        The topWindow TextArea holds the information sent from the other end of the connection.

      • sendButton

        private Button sendButton
        The sendButton Button object causes the material in the lower window to be sent over the communication line.

        The data is also sent when the user depresses the Return key on the keyboard. This button on the form may be removed at a later date.

      • closeButton

        private Button closeButton
        The closeButton Button can be used to close the connection when it fails to close normally.

      • myFrame

        private Frame myFrame
        Object for the frame in which the application is displayed.

        The menu bar is attached to the frame.

      • myPanel

        private Panel myPanel
        The myPanel panel provides a place to attach key listeners.

        It appears that a Panel is a container, but a Frame isn't. Since listeners must be attached to containers, it was necessary to create a panel within the frame.

        After the object is created, a listener is created with an anonymous inner class to react to changes in the size of the panel.

      • windowName

        private String windowName

    • Constructor Detail

      • communicationsWindow

        public communicationsWindow(String name)

    • Method Detail

      • windowResizer

        protected void windowResizer()
        This method is called when the window is resized.

        It examines the width and height of the windows to determine whether the TextArea objects should have their height and width changed.

      • addMessage

        protected void addMessage(String display)
        This method generates a message and adds it to the log and the Sys.output character stream.

      • processKey

        protected void processKey(KeyEvent e)
        This function is called whenever a key is pressed.

        If the Delete or Backspace key is depressed, the last character in the bottomWindow textArea is removed.

        If the Return key is depressed, the contents of bottomWindow are sent to the remote system and contents of bottomWindow are erased.

      • sendMessage

        protected void sendMessage()
        This method is called when the Send button is depressed on the form or the user depresses the Return key on the keyboard.

      • setDebugLevel

        public void setDebugLevel(int level)
        This method is used to control the amount of diagnostic messages generated.

        A value of 0 means no messages are to be printed. Higher values generate larger amounts of messages.

      • getDebugLevel

        public int getDebugLevel()

      • start

        public void start(Socket inputSock)
        This is the main method for creating the communications window and setting up the communications stream.
